title: Buy-Side Due Diligence
summary: Commercial and financial diligence for a cross-border acquisition.
description: Led financial diligence for a $150M acquisition. Validated quality of earnings (QoE), normalized EBITDA, and identified key post-merger integration risks.

title: Cost Structure Analysis
summary: Mapped cost centers for a hospital network to identify redundancies.
description: Implemented a zero-based budgeting framework saving $2m annually.
